name: Ensure to release media resorces at OnStop() and OnDestroy() to efficiently use resources
Prefer not using MODE_WORLD_READABLE or MODE_WORLD_WRITABLE to share files with other apps
Prefer using BiometricPrompt API instead of FingerprintManager as the latter is deprecated
onAuthenticationFailed:callback should be always triggered to correctly manage the BiometricPrompt
Ensure to check all the BiometricPrompt error options in the onAuthenticationError method
Ensure to check all BiometricPrompt acquired options in the onAuthenticationSucceeded method
Ensure you have checked FEATURE_FINGERPRINT to verifify supports Biometric capability  before using BiometricPrompt API
